Postcard from The National Gallery, Great Britain. 6oct01 - ICON OF ANGUISH :Munch's ' The Scream ' - overexposed. NZH 23aug04 - NZH 23Feb13 - Munch, on hearing IAE. WAG 27Sep14 - LONG HISTORY: Cadmium was discovered by Friedrich Stromeyer in 1817 and was adopted by many artists including Edvard Munch for The Scream (right).
